FuncDef: The reset segment-routing traffic-statistics command clears SR LSP (that is, SR-MPLS BE tunnel) traffic statistics.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an interface IP address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies a mask length.
The value is 32.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To clear SR LSP traffic statistics before re-collection, run the reset segment-routing traffic-statistics command.
The statistics can be queried using the display segment-routing traffic-statistics command.
